text: 🚨 Update from the front lines 🚨Ukrainian forces are putting up a fierce resistance against Russian troops in eastern Ukraine! 💪🏻 Despite being outnumbered and outgunned, we're fighting tooth and nail for our homeland. 🌳🇺🇦The battle rages on near Avdiivka, Bakhmut, and Pokrovsk. Russia may have an advantage in firepower and manpower, but we have something they don't - the will to defend our land and our people! 💪🏻🇺🇦Don't believe the lies and propaganda from Moscow. We won't back down. We won't give up. We'll keep fighting for our freedom, no matter what! 💥🇺🇦
